blogPost.title: Why should women in business prioritize self care? Answer by @CWaltersPhD, Business & Branding Mentor, Corporate Trainer & Author. https://t.co/uKUaCRCpwX https://t.co/osccpnI97g
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 为什么商界女性要把自我保健放在首位？回答者：@CWaltersPhD，商业& 品牌导师，企业培训师& 作者：https://t.co/uKUaCRCpwX https://t.co/osccpnI97g。

なぜビジネスパーソンの女性がセルフケアを優先すべきなのか？Answer by @CWaltersPhD, Business & Branding Mentor, Corporate Trainer & Author. https://t.co/uKUaCRCpwX https://t.co/osccpnI97g

previous.title: Why will this holiday season take a bigger toll on people's health than in the past? Answer by Mary Jacobson, Chief Medical Director @helloalphamd. https://t.co/yVd9JjTw0a https://t.co/aUU1T3Tois

localize.full_text: 为什么这个节日对人们健康的影响会比过去更大？由首席医疗总监玛丽-雅各布森@helloalphamd回答。https://t.co/yVd9JjTw0a https://t.co/aUU1T3Tois。
爲什麼這個節日對人們健康的影響會比過去更大？由首席醫療總監瑪麗-雅各布森@helloalphamd回答。https://t.co/yVd9JjTw0a https://t.co/aUU1T3Tois。
なぜ今年のホリデーシーズンは、過去に比べて人々の健康に大きな影響を与えるのでしょうか？Answer by Mary Jacobson, Chief Medical Director @helloalphamd. https://t.co/yVd9JjTw0a https://t.co/aUU1T3Tois
